reactor 0.2.1

Construct Path to reactor directory

Source: R/read_files.R
reactor_path.Rd

Consructs the path to reactor temporary directory.

reactor_path(x = tempdir(), ...)

Arguments

x

character, root of the path, Default: tempdir()
...

additional arguments to pass to file.path

Value

character

See also

Other reactor: init_reactor(), kill_app(), navigate_to_app(), read_reactor(), reset_counter(), start_reactor(), wait_for_shiny()

Examples

reactor_path()

#> [1] "/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpWBWTaZ/reactor"
reactor_path(tempdir(),'internal')

#> [1] "/var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpWBWTaZ/reactor/internal"
